articles.title: Father of the metric system in South Africa dies - MyBroadband
articles.description: The man who led the charge to convert South Africa from pounds, feet, miles, gallons, and morgen to grams, metres, litres, and square metres has passed away.
articles.content:
Prof Heinz Prekel, the man at the tip of the spear of South Africas transition from imperial to metric measurements, passed away in his home on Thursday. He was 89.
